title: Add images to the application

requirements.text: Add new images to the application as specified by the user in the image requirements section

quotes: আমি কিছু ছবি এড করতে চাই

acceptanceCriteria: New images are generated and placed in frontend/public/assets/generated
Images are accessible and render correctly in the application
Image filenames follow the naming convention with dimensions

requirements.text: Integrate the newly generated images into appropriate locations within the Smart Shop interface
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are referenced in relevant components
Images enhance the visual appeal and functionality of the marketplace
All image paths resolve correctly to the generated assets

constraints: Images must be placed in frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Do not modify read-only UI component sources in frontend/src/components/ui
Maintain the existing market-inspired visual theme
nonGoals: Modifying the existing product catalog functionality

required: Fresh produce banner with vibrant vegetables on wooden background (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
Organic farming landscape with green fields (organic-section.dim_800x500.png)
Shopping basket filled with colorful vegetables (promo-basket.dim_600x600.png)
